title: Teach Me How To Snuggie
description: In-stadium promotional games. Myrtle (10:10). Drinking at children’s parties (12:32). Pandemic first dates (23:02). Charitable Bills Mafia (33:10). Not objectifying AARON Rodgers (41:35). #1 QB Chad Henne (46:22). Is Drew Brees done (1:24:24)? POPE FACTS (1:55:18). Cavaliers throw food again 92:10:40). And lastly, how to make friends in a pandemic (2:23:55).
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie talks Chad Henne on LinkedIn, Pope facts, throwing food & more
